## Welcome!!


Hi my name is **Johan Sebastián Sáenz** and I am a microbial ecologist currently
working in the <a href="https://livestock-functional-microbiology.uni-hohenheim.de/en" target="_blank">Department of Functional Microbiology of Livestock</a> at the Hohenheim University.

I am interested in the main drivers of microbial community structure
and function, with special focus on the phage´s role.
